title: King GK
author: King GK
content: Dealing Based on experience you won't be able to earn $ 200 per month in doing bounty campaigns. These a huge risks in trading but if you can learn and probably predict the trend you will earn more than your target amount. Just be prepared for the loss though particularly if you are going to trend these days as these are economic ðŸ“ˆ problems approximating the spread of the virus it is much better to start with trading after this problem is over

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: I would recommend to do interest in bounties compaign rather to do trade . Trading is very risky without learning about it.
